謜謜謜

謜字的基本解释

謜
yuán
〔謜謜〕徐徐，缓慢，如“故謜謜而来。”

謜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》愚袁切，平元，疑。］
见“謜謜”。

謜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謜； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1176第01
【唐韻】魚怨切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】虞怨切，?元去聲。【說文】徐語也。引《孟子》故謜謜而來。今本作源。又【玉篇】魚園切【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】愚袁切，?音元。義同。　又【廣雅】度也。　又人名。【唐書】邕王李謜。又【遼史·世祖紀】高麗王世于王謜來朝。　又【廣韻】此緣切【集韻】逡緣切，?音銓。言語和悅也。

謜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
謜字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
yuán
〔謜謜] Slowly, slowly, as in "the old 謜蜬 is coming."
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guang Yun" Yu Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, doubt. ]
See "Lingo".
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謜; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1176 01
[Tang Yun] Fish resentment cut [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Yu resentment cut, Yuan Qusheng. [Speaking text] Xu Yu also. Quoting from "Mencius". This is the source. Also [Jade articles] Yuyuan cut [Guangyun] [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yuyuan cut,? Phoneme. The same meaning.　[Guang Ya] Du Ye.　Another name. [Book of Tang] King Yong and Li Jian. Also 【Liao History·Shizu Ji】The king of Korea was reigned in the dynasty of Wang Jian.　[Guangyun] This edge cut [Jiyun] The edge cut,? Yinquan. Words are also pleasant.
